*[[Amazon Echo Show (MW46WB)]] • [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01J24C0TI B01J24C0TI] • [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Amazon+Echo+Show+Teardown/94625 ''Teardown'' on '''iFixit'''] :CPU: [[Intel Atom]] [https://ark.intel.com/products/93361/Intel-Atom-x5-Z8350-Processor-2M-Cache-up-to-1_92-GHz x5-Z8350] (@1.92GHz), 802.11abgn/ac, Bluetooth 4.1 :Display: 7" Touchscreen, Camera: 5MP, Audio: Dual 2" Stereo Speaker <!-- :Intel Atom x5-Z8350 (SR2KT) - Quad Core (2M Cache, up to 1.92GHz) :Cherry Trail, @1.44GHz, GPU, DDR3L-RS 1600, (SDP 2W, 14nm) :SK hynix H9CCNNNBKTML - 2GB RAM :Sandisk SDIN9DS2-8G - 8GB NAND embedded Flash Drive :Broadcom/Cypress BCM43570KFFBG - 5G Wi-Fi 802.11ac 2×2 BT 4.1 EDR :Winbond W25Q16FW - 2MB (16Mb) 1.8V serial flash memory :Goodix GT9271 - 10-point capacitive touch controller :Texas Instruments TPA3118 - 30W Stereo (BTL) Class-D Audio Amplifier :Wolfson WM8904G - Ultra-Low Power Codec for portable Audio applications :4x Texas Instruments TLV320ADC3101 - 92dB SNR Low-Power Stereo ADC (Echo/Echo Dot) :TI SND9039A2 - Power Manager IC, 8x Microphone, PSU adapter 15V DC 1.4A -->
